| blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 1267413 | website = City of Hartford | footnotes = }} Hartford is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Minnehaha County, about ten miles west of Sioux Falls. It became a city in 1878, and 3,354 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Hartford website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1878 establishments in the United States Category:1870s establishments in Dakota Territory
title: Hartford, South Dakota
